#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>

#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>

#define SI(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define MX 1003
typedef long long LL;
using namespace std;

int n;
char S[MX];
char M[26];

int main()
{
    scanf("%d\n",&n);
//getchar();

    while(n-- >0)
    {
      gets(S);
      gets(M);
//      cout<<S;       
      int k = strlen(S);
      for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
      {
        if(S[i]==' ') continue;
        S[i] = M[(S[i]-'A')];
      }
        printf("%s\n",S);
    }
	return 0;
}
